summary: Comprehensive testing completed for B-CON Consulting website. Backend APIs 100% functional, frontend 95% functional with excellent Romanian content and professional design.

design_issues.issue: Blog posts created in admin may not be visible on public blog page by default
design_issues.note: Posts need to be marked as 'published' in admin to appear on public blog

passed_tests: Homepage loads with hero section, services, stats, CTA
Navigation menu works across all pages
About page displays company info in Romanian
Contact form submission and database storage
Admin dashboard with all tabs functional
Admin CRUD for blog posts working
